text: napurata phalavipaka (vasayen) evæni napura(ma karannaha. ita vædiyen nova). namut kavurun ho (an ayage aparadhayata) samava di (ohu samaga) samadana vuvahot ohuge phalavipaka allah kerehi (anivaryaya yutukamak vasayen) ætteya. niyata vasayenma ohu (meyata venasva) simava ikmavannanva priya karanne næta
